channel.title: CVE Feed for IBM -- Rational DOORS Next Generation
channel.description: The latest CVEs for IBM -- Rational DOORS Next Generation

item.title: CVE-2020-4297|2024-09-16T16:43:56.408Z -- ibm -- rational%20doors%20next%20generation
item.description: IBM DOORS Next Generation (DNG/RRC) 6.0.2, 6.0.6, 6.0.6.1, and 7.0 is vulnerable to cross-site scripting. This vulnerability allows users to embed arbitrary JavaScript code in the Web UI thus altering the intended functionality potentially leading to credentials disclosure within a trusted session. IBM X-Force ID: 176474.

item.title: CVE-2017-1593|2024-09-16T17:13:57.783Z -- ibm -- rational%20doors%20next%20generation
item.description: IBM DOORS Next Generation (DNG/RRC) 4.0, 5.0, and 6.0 is vulnerable to cross-site scripting. IBM X-Force ID: 132494.
